statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-8 \, x^{3} - 8 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x , -6 \, x^{3} - 11 \, x^{2} - 19 \, x + 10 , 14 \, x^{3} + 17 \, x^{2} + 14 \, x - 6 , -4 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - x , -2 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x + 2\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
